document.full_text: an al qaeda-linked militant group in iraq pledged support to the organization's second-in-command, ayman al-zawahiri, and vowed more revenge attacks for the death of osama bin laden at the hands of u.s. forces in pakistan.
document.title: iraq's qaeda pledges support to zawahri, vows attacks
lines_and_colors: an al qaeda-linked militant group in iraq pledged support to the organization's second-in-command, ayman al-zawahiri, and vowed more revenge attacks for the death of osama bin laden at the hands of u.s. forces in pakistan.
